name: SFKeychainSavePanel
desc: A panel or sheet that allows the user to create a keychain.

items.name: func beginSheet(forDirectory: String!, file: String!, modalFor: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!)
items.desc: Displays a sheet that allows a user to create a new keychain.

items.name: func error() -> Error!
items.desc: Returns the last error encountered by the keychain save panel.

items.name: func keychain() -> Unmanaged<SecKeychain>!
items.desc: Returns the keychain created by the keychain save panel.

items.name: func runModal(forDirectory: String!, file: String!) -> Int
items.desc: Displays a panel that allows a user to create a new keychain.

items.name: func setPassword(String!)
items.desc: Specifies the password for the keychain that will be created.

items.name: class func shared() -> SFKeychainSavePanel!
items.desc: Returns a shared keychain save panel object.
